price: Kuma ka sassauta fikãfikanka* ga wanda ya bĩ ka daga mũminai.
arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: * Ka zama mai tausayi ga mũminai waɗanda suka bĩ ka, ka yi musu kamar yadda kãzã take yi wa 'ya'yanta ƙanana a lõkacin sanyi, kõ kuwa idan zã su yi barci dõmin ta kãre su daga cũta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'fiḍ janāḥaka limani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
